name: Natural LazyHair
text:
Thank you again Johnny for making each visit so worthwhile!
The Staff here are ALWAYS so professional, fast and friendly when preparing my food. You should already know I'll be back soon for more!

name: Nick Griparis
text: Highly customizable menu, laid back atmosphere. Service was quick and friendly. Only takes 5-10 minutes to get your pizza thanks to the wood fired oven. No matter the amount of toppings you choose, the Build Your Own is one price; I was ‚Ä¶More

name: Kyle Stoffers
text: Great, quick service and good eats. It's entirely too loud in this place every time I have been here and it's basically impossible to hear what the workers are saying/ asking. I feel kind of rude just shouting what I want on my pizza, it usually ends up hitting the spot eventually.

name: Nikita Kravtsov
text: Love this place. Best customer service ever. All the staff is incredibly friendly and helpful. When 5 other friends and I came and ordered pizza, the workers gave us a free pizza on the house. Will definitely come back way more.

name: Joel Porter
text: Ordered delivery and everything arrived hot and fresh.  Delicious and yummy.  They have a ton of topping options to keep things interesting.  Would definitely order from here again.

name: jeremy jackson
text: Speedy, affordable and tasty food. Excellent customer service. A good place to dine in during covid-19

name: Rex Luthor
text: Built my custom pizza and was better than I imagined has loads of healthy options too

name: Dustin T. Rhoads
text:
Parking on the street is better than valet.
Call early to get a reservation OR even a couple days before.
There's also Mozza -to -Go. But, call ahead at least an hour.

name: Antonio Lomeli
text: Pizza is excellent!! Cooked to order in a fiery brick oven while you wait. Highly recommend

name: Ray Markovich
text: Fast and friendly service. Reasonable price and they're ingredients are all without chemicals and additives

name: Gary G
text: Blah pizza, but the server was super friendly.

name: Your Spiritual Rock Raquel
text: Keto crust was surprisingly tasty.  Yum.

name: Erik Nerison
text: Had an awesome personal pizza for $9! Being vegan it's tough to find good üçï to satisfy the craving. I was able to have great chewy thin crust, red sauce, vegan cheese, mushrooms, tomatoes, garlic, arugula, abd balsamic drizzle on this pizza and it was delicious! Would recommend and go again for sure.

name: janet megan
text: Small place but cozy and the staff were really very polite and friendly.It's almost closing time when we got there  and still they waited until we finished eating. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tomas Lopez-Betanzos
text: It's the most production line version of pizza I've seen. If it means fresh made every time and super fast, I'm not mad about it. This location has excellent access to transit, within 100 feet of the Belmont Red/Purple/Brown CTA stop, and ‚Ä¶More

name: chris griffin
text: Very Excellent service. I never had any bad experience here. I always love their pizza especially when I am with my sister.  We love to spend quality time here because we feel very comfortable with place and very happy with the delicious pizza in our table. This feels like our second home.

name: WiggyWoz
text: It's ok. The dough taste good in a cheese pizza. It's fun for occasional pizza parties and they have large pizza deals for delivery. As a pizza lover for 20+ years I've had some flavorful pizzas in the past; you may wanna add some spices to yours as it can taste dull at times. All in all it's good occasionally.

name: Joy Banks
text: My first time at Blaze Pizza. Experience straight forward. Didn't feel rushed or inexperienced. Fresh ingredients and the pizza was really good. Employees were nice, friendly, and accomodating. Highly recommend. Will visit again.

name: Nathan Steinbach
text: Quick, easy stop off Belmont. They were very friendly and conscientious about my plant based diet and it made me feel comfortable with how they're handling things. Will for sure come back again.

name: Darin Fentress
text: Pizza made from scratch right before your very eyes, exactly as you want it? Yes please! Always friendly and willing to make it how I want it, even if that means piling on way more meat than is allowed by law.  Reasonably priced and oh so delicious. This is what I crave now.

name: Stefan Micic
text: Good food, friendly staff.

name: Joshua Koepke
text: Inviting casual pizza joint that offers build-your-own style and specialty pizzas. Baked quick, order to served within 10 minutes. Reasonable prices and excellent taste. Not a heavy or thick pizza, but filling and made with fresh ingredients. Plenty of variety making it high on the list to go to again.

name: Lorse Fulton
text: I was in there on Dec 31st around 720pm, and I  have been coming  there for lunch for the last 2 months. In this particular day the New Manager ( the young lady) has no customer service,  and she was talking bad talk about a customer ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle Hicks
text: Great food clean and people very friendly

name: Assad Habib
text: Sooo good! I love the concept where you can choose your toppings and see your pizza being made from scratch right before your eyes.

name: David Martinez
text: The best Pizza I ever had. Build your own with a plethora of toppings. Great sauce and crust options

name: Emily Butterfield
text: Love love love this place! The staff/service at this location has always been great.

name: Zaimah Saleem
text: Loved this place. The pizza was awesome. My only issue was that the sauce was a little too sweet for my taste.

name: cesar flores
text: What's not to like about building your own pizza and putting a goofy amount of meat on it and only be charged as if you only had one meat. Never had a bad experience at any blaze, unless I went to creative and put a crazy cheese or cheeses together, other than that I like blaze.

name: Derreck
text: I love the Blaze build your own pizza concept.  The cane sugar fountain drinks are pretty good too.  Usually a bit crowded and popular among college students, but the staff is nice and keep it clean.

name: Joe S.
text: The only thin-crust acceptable in Chicago! One of my favorite local spots. Awesome fast pizza late at night. Super fresh ingredients & always friendly staff.

name: Marisha Humphries
text: Fresh, yummy pizza. We took our 12yo & friends. Loved they could get their own customized pizzas for a good price; very affordable. And the staff was phenomenal! Fantastic customer service - friendly, helpful, and welcoming. Looking forward to returning.

name: Ted Ikari
text: Ordinarily, I really enjoy Blaze Pizza, a freshly made Pizza, down to the crust, fired and served right in front of your very eyes. Unfortunately, this locale was by far the least of them all. ‚Ä¶More

name: Lalece Slack
text: Great single  üçï options

name: John Kerstetter
text:
Excellent personalized pizza! The orders in the store are quickly prepared and cooked, so the wait time is very reasonable. The staff were attentive and personable, taking care of our needs.
The gluten free crust is an great option.

name: Nicole Musi
text: Definitely love the vegan options here! Affordable and everyone working there has great customer service. I always forget it's there because it's relatively new for us, but I really enjoy going.

name: Elizabeth MacDonell
text: The employees were very helpful with explaining the process & options since it was my first time there. They answered all my questions about the ingredients to make sure I was staying vegan. It was the perfect place for a quick bite between ‚Ä¶More

name: ChRiS AcE23
text: Online orders coming in were so messed up in there. It made everyones order delayed. Recommend changing online order system.

name: Kandi Fowler
text: Love their üçï

name: Jaclyn Kwiatkowski
text: Affordable, good tasting, and with gluten free options! They have options to choose from or you can make your own. Limited booze selection, seat yourself. Make sure you ask for a key to the Bathroom! Right under the redline so it's very convenient but still a chain. This is not the Chicago pizza you are looking for.

name: Lillian Waddy
text: Love the pizza, nice staff. Came at night and I think his name is Larry he was very nice. Will come back again and bring more friends.

name: Alexandra Hazen
text: Delicious pizza! I love the idea of creating your own pizza with choosing your puzza off the menu. I had the white pizza, which has a white sauce, arugula, bacon bits,  and mozzarella cheese. Very quick to waiting time.  To drink, I had a mango aqua fresca that was light  and freshing. Close to the belmont stop, which is nice.

name: Jamie Powell
text: Great pizza, poor customer service, they hate BLK ppl eatin or Workin there....

name: Lele Zambrano
text: Good pizzas, TERRIBLE DELIVERY SERVICE. I called to place an order specifying it was for my kids birthday the next day at 12pm, and they delivered the night before at midnight. Now no one answers for my order or my money, so I'll have to ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Sylvester
text: Great, knowledgeable, and friendly staff. Good pizza

name: Joe Cunningham
text: I could eat my weight in pizza - and still not feel ashamed. Love this place.

name: Denise Bowker
text: Always yummy

name: Bettina Appleberry
text: OMG! Delicious. Taste like pizza looks in the movies.

name: Andrew Igel
text: Better than MOD Pizza. So many more options and fresher ingredients. Awesome üçï

name: Yaz
text: One of the best and friendliest pizza places I have been to. They're always great.

name: Daevon Reynolds
text: They are really nice and patient funny too.... Literally love when they tell jokes and they remember faces well

name: Serge Abellard
text: Solid pizza place overall. I like the amount of options. I had the keto pizza, which was delicious and satisfied my craving for pizza while on a low-carb diet. The crust was crispy but did not have much flavor itself but you can fix that with a good topping collection. Great option for keto folks and regular thib crust pizza lovers.

name: Rozell Alaina
text: The staff, amazing. The choices, amazing. Pizza is ALWAYS DELICIOUS ü§©!

name: Jordan Evans
text: Great value for money, fast service, reasonable pizza that is nicely customizable. Very nice interactions every time I've been there. I'd never recommend it as a great pizza necessarily, but high on the list for a quick meal.

name: Laura Rivero
text: Delicious, thin crust pizza and the servers are nice and fast. 11 bucks will get you a pizza and a drink!

name: Antonio Sanders
text: It's great üëç meet up place

name: Fitsum Samuel Hailu
text: Their pizzas are very tasty and you have the option to choose from a menu or make a pizza of your choosing. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kevin Sandoval
text: The wait time for a pizza is ridiculously long. Go find a better place with better pizza.

name: Jade White
text: Vegan build it yourself pizza! Quick, easy, tasty ingredients and open late.

name: Chris Faxel
text: You‚Äôre not going to get a better value for pizza than Blaze.  Creating your own pizza has never been this easy or fast.  Great friendly staff.

name: Laura Dillon
text: Love using their app to order ahead! Pizza was tasty as usual!

name: Kenni Terrell
text: Quick service, good food!

name: Isiah Rogers
text: Get the green stripe. Its literally the only pizza I get and their blood orange lemonade is definitely a go to

name: Johnnie Betts
text: My first time there. The staff was extremely  friendly, welcoming, and helpful.  Service was prompt. The pizza was on the bland side I will admit, but at no fault of anyone at the restaurant.  I would definitely go again and possible switch up my ingredients.

name: Tibi Tomulet
text: Great place for a quick pizza. Prices are a bit above average.

name: Angela Latona
text: It‚Äôs a fun place to go and try different things. Lots of vegetarian options. The line moves about as fast as you would expect and I‚Äôve never had trouble finding a seat.

name: Michael Ogden-Schuette
text:
Great, fast, reasonably priced thin crust pizza.
(Recommend the spicy red sauce) ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley Anderson
text: I usually love this place and the staff is usually amazing. But came in today around 12 and the Ladies attitude, who took my order and made my pizza, really sucked. She spoke to me with her back turned and I couldn't hear her. When I asked ‚Ä¶More

name: Shane Forbes
text: Their food is great, but their employees are rude. An employee falsely accused me of using a water cup to steal a soft drink. After that experience I have not been back. If you go here, don't get water to drink or you might be accused of stealing too.

name: Jamie Heller
text: The manager who looks like Freddy Mercury is hostile and rude. Learn manners.

name: Chrissy
text: I really enjoyed the dough knots, and I'm sure the pizza can be good, but I didn't have the best experience here. If you haven't been here before, I highly recommend looking up the menu before you even get here and decide exactly what you ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe W
text: Quick pizza when you need it.

name: Jimmy Jasso
text: Great customer service!

name: Johnnyray Rivera
text: Love my pizza from here but it's not very thick if that's what your looking for. But still Great!

name: Ewan Dickson
text: Not the greatest pizza, but pretty damn good and is fast as. I would consider it fast food, but much better than it's counterparts.

name: Denise Denney
text: Building my pizza was fun. Great staff and the waiting wasn't long.

name: Frank Adame
text: Sick good pizza. Get the high-rise it's so good

name: Rasheedah Fletcher
text: Really enjoyed this place.. Loved that you get to make your own personal pizza and get to see it being made. My only problem was I got bacon on my pizza and it was extremely salty. Other than that it was great

name: Perry Banner
text: I was accused of stealing by am employee for filling my free water cup with carbonated water. I get carbonated water 50% of the time when eating out and have never had this happen to me before. It really upset me. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brandon Douglas
text: Decent pizza for the price

name: Nicey J. On the Slayyy
text: Great food, great service..chill vibez

name: clear clear
text: It's a fun place to come every once in a while.

name: Hector M.
text: I absolutely love bringing my kids here. Pizzas are delicious!!! The drinks are amazing also. It does draw a big crowd at peak times. Come hungry

name: Cristin Just
text: I like Mod better. Staff at this one was a nightmare. They were downright mean

name: Judy Corrigan
text: Went to Blaze for the first time with my daughter. We ordered pizza and wine. I had no ID but since I‚Äôm over 65 you wouldn‚Äôt think this wouldn‚Äôt be an issue. Apparently it was. Company policy I was told. Ridiculous that staff is unable to ‚Ä¶More

name: Analdi Negron
text: build your own pizza and then enjoy it

name: Austin OMalley
text: i asked the host what he typically ate and he hooked me up with the best pizza ever

name: A. Jas
text: It's fast food pizza, good ingredients, lots of selections, and like the option of different sauces.

name: Mario Ruiz JR
text: Little pizzas but big taste. Kids loved it as they can see and choose their toppings.

name: Ana Mendoza
text: Rude employees and over priced pizza! Our pizza was lukewarm. Will not be returning.

name: Tricia daily
text: I think it's a little overpriced, and not as good as the hype.  Thin crust,  all the usual toppings. It's ok but really not to rave about.  No special wonderful comfort food like pizza is supposed to be.  There are a lot if vegan toppings ‚Ä¶More

name: Vishal Gupta
text: Blaze is my go to always. I mean where else can you get a build your own pizza with unlimited ingredients and I mean everything is unlimited from sauce to cheese to meats and veggies and the staff is always so friendly and always serve you with a smile. I love this pizza place and have it almost once every 2 weeks.

name: lexi kasai
text: The pizza üçï was really good

name: Zachary Cox
text: Blaze is usually great, but this location is horrible. The pizzas are always undercooke - the staff gets overwhelmed when there‚Äôs 5+ people to serve and 1) don‚Äôt cook the pizzas long enough in an effort to try to speed through the line or ‚Ä¶More

name: Rhonda Purwin
text: Love this place!  For less than nine dollars, you can have as many toppings as you like.  Toppings are fresh and surprising for the price.  Pizza Cooks in minutes in the super hot oven. Get the online app and you get lots of freebies.

name: Ana Serratosa
text: Really nice staff working there. Specially John

name: Katherine Thompson
text: This place is great! Quick, cheap and good pizza. The salads are a bit disappointing, but otherwise top notch fast casual.

name: Mishal J. Kamdar
text: Very nice pizza.  Love the finishing sauces.

name: Jose Arriaga
text: Friendly staff! Pizza is always delicious and cooked just right (my experience). This is one of my go-to spots in the area. Be ready to wait  a bit in line during lunch/dinner rush.

name: Aiyendae Lagrand
text: I absolutely love blaze pizza, its literally the best pizza I've had, I love how nice and friendly the employees are, they take pride and care in making sure the food is to your liking and it always is. I will definitely make sure I eat here whenever I'm given the opportunity.

name: Denise Centeno
text: Phenomenal place...a must try‚ù§ they have gluten free woohoo

name: Jazzy Lady
text: The service is amazing everyone is so friendly.  My pizza is perfect! They have Turkey meatballs and unlimited fountain drinks! I'm currently eating one of their brownies warmed in the oven and my heart us also warm now too.  This is my 1st visit to Blaze pizza but it surely won't be my last!

name: Heidi George
text: Excellent pizza, fast. Just what we wanted after Blue Man.

name: Lucas Cron
text: As far as Blaze pizzas go, this one is quality. Good staff. It's also open late, which is nice. ‚Ä¶More

name: Shaun Paul Kennedy
text: Yummy fast pizza and super inexpensive

name: Robert Hansen
text: This unique place has different styles of pizza. Not your traditional pepperoni and sausage and mushroom pizza is made in this place. Pizza I think can be any kind of a diverse food material that you can eat. So go in here and have some different kind of pizza.

name: Jasmine Gallardo
text: The staff seemed like they didn't really want to be there but maybe because it was right after the pride weekend and im sure they were tired. The food was ok but to be fair we were trying something new.

name: suicide shots
text: Always a good spot to hit

name: Zombie Shark

name: Gale Meade
text: Very quick, courteous service. Food good.

name: Naveed Asem
text: Love this place. especially the freedom to pick your own toppings for pizza and how you like them

name: Paula Trent
text: Fresh food. Great for family, groups of all ages to gather. Good pizza served fast. Great selection of craft sodas and beers. Only draw back is it tends to be extremely crowded after four and beyond. But I have always found a seat. There are probably as many take outs or more as dine ins.

name: Dana Martin
text: Delicious and generous! Get the red vine with extra basil on the side and Italian sausage if you like meat!

name: Ace Edmonds
text: Polite and attentive employees, good at explaining how it works for me customers. Facility is clean. Could stand to turn the music down a little. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jake Steelman
text: Great assembly line style pizza joint, me and my friends love it! How could you not?

name: AA
text: I just love the concept of it. You can add as much as veggies to want of your choice . I m vegetarian and this is the best place for all veggie pizza lover .

text:
Ohh!! Yup it was fun to make ur own pizza ...they baked it so quickly and we'll.
Thin crust yummy  hot thin crust pizza...it was too good and was surprised I ‚Ä¶More

name: Joel Hutchens
text: The pizza is good, fast and priced right. But the best part of Belmont's Blaze is the people.  Maybe the friendliest counter staff you'll ever find.

name: Gypman
text: First visit - good pizza, fair price, great location.

name: henry davis
text: The crust is delicious and also the service is quicker than I expected üòâüòã

name: Roberto Valencia Flores
text:
First time to the Blaze and what an amazing experience. Tommy and Jerome were so nice and friendly like we were long time customers.
Pizza was great and fairly priced with great drink choices . The only area of ‚Ä¶More

name: Keith Privett
text: Very fast made-to-order small thin crust pizza with good variety of ingredients (never thought squash and zucchini would work, but they do), nicely done, and ordered as assembled, like at Subway. ‚Ä¶More

name: Marco Mata
text: Amazing place to go get a pizza in Chicago! Loved it here my first time. Had so many options to go and create a custom pizza about 15" for about 8 bucks! An amazingly awesome deal! They can expect more business from me!

name: Patrick Johnopolos
text: The 14 inch pizza is not expensive and has a thin crust. You choose the toppings and it is cooked in 3 minutes. It is a comfortable place to eat.

name: Nikola Laziƒá
text: Maybe I always want more from this place and I should just accept that it is fast food pizza, but every time I go I leave a bit disappointed. I definitely prefer the thicker crust pizza, although it does take longer to bake. The toppings ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle Gilliam
text: First Time trying BLAZE PIZZA üçï & I LOVE IT! VEGAN CHEESE WITH THE VEGGIES!

name: alex marzo
text: quick and good

name: Suzy Blaz
text: I like Blaze pizza, but they don't clean their cutting utensils at the end of the line and I am always ending up with pieces of food dropped on mine that I didn't not want. Easy enough to take off, but still, they should work on that. Toppings I want are not always available too.

name: Erin RavenSkye
text: Blaze, what is this? Really inconsistent sizes in these ‚Äúdough knots‚Äù kind of not worth the money. This is more of a dollar menu item for what I got, not worth what you‚Äôre charging. I‚Äôll stick with the pizza and skip the add on items.

text: Quick and easy make your own pizza chain. Ingredients are many and varied - even vegan cheese option. What you put on your pizza is your business. There are thousands of different variations, so you can come here over and over again. It's ‚Ä¶More

text: Delicious pizza. They didn't hold back on the toppings, and were incredibly patient with a first-time customer.

name: Kevin Pickett
text: Great create your own pizzas for a low price with fast service

name: Robin Krautbauer
text: Staff very good with gluten free pizza. If you tell them allergy or Celiac disease they change their gloves... Get the wrapped gf crust, use sauce from a different container.. uncontaminated. The pizza is on a silicone pad so it doesn't ‚Ä¶More

name: J. Renee Miles
text: I will be going to MOD pizza. For now on. From the lackadaisical attitude of the staff and overall atmosphere, I will not come back here again.

name: Hannah Eckstein
text: Good quick pizza. It's thin so sometimes the crust gets a little burnt. The desserts are really good.

name: David Johnsen
text: If you want a one-topping pizza, you can probably find someplace better in Chicago. But if you like a variety of toppings, Blaze is fantastic and inexpensive. My last pizza had pepperoni, chicken, bacon, ricotta, jalapeno, spinach, and ‚Ä¶More

text: Guy name Douglas help me order it the RIGHT WAY! Came in NOT sure of what I WANTED far as toppings üëëüíéüëë

name: Mohamed Galal
text: Speedy, tasty and great service crew

name: Melissa Sanchez
text: Delicious, delicious pizza! I love that there is such unique options to build your own pizza. Only takes 3 minutes to cook in their oven - comes out beautifully crispy. It's pretty spacious inside, has a warehouse feel with its concrete floors and open ceilings. I'm definitely planning to go there again!

name: Joel Cayton
text: This is a fairly popular location so expect a little bit of a wait for a table. They do a lot of specials / promos that will save you a few bucks. The app isn't that great. Sometimes it works without any problems, most of the time its buggy, loads slowly or wont let you scan to pay. Use at your own risk.

name: Ashland Thomas
text: Make your own. Blood Orange Lemonade. Perfect every time.

name: Caitlin Perkins
text: Have some really good pizza. I love the crust and cheese they use. It kinda sucks that it's only one size, but it's quality, and the leftovers heat up well and also taste really good cold too.

name: jay maddox
text: Great blazing pizza

name: Nicole Argudin
text: Great place to eat in or take out. The staff is nice and provide great service. I always order the build your own pizza and it always comes out quick and very delicious!

name: Jessica Hughes
text: Great personal pizzas made to order! Fresh ingredients and lots of choices in toppings!

name: Thomas Cunningham
text: The please is nice on the inside and very good atmosphere. The staff are very friendly and respectful. And the pizza is very good and quick to be made. With is convenience of Belmont station right next door. This place deserves 5 stars ( despite The weather).

name: Kashif Khundmiri
text: Quick in an out plus freshly stone baked pizza like a Mediterranean tandoor...

name: Scott Fenstermacher
text: Good fast pizza if you like thin crust individual pizzas. Quick place to eat if you need food before a show at one of the nearby theaters.

name: Emily Z
text: Lots of very informative reviews already, but I can't resist throwing in my 2cents! ‚Ä¶More

text: Great tasting pizza! Comes out very fast!

text: It‚Äôs like subway but with pizza. Very pricey and not filling at all.

name: Nicole Carpenter
text: While the food was great and the concept is really neat, there are some incredibly unprofessional people working at this establishment. ‚Ä¶More

name: Denise Bowker
text: I love Blaze.  I go all the time to different locations.  One thing you can count on is consistency.  Thin crust and yummy.

name: Nick
text: Second time they‚Äôve completely burnt my pizza, seriously? You should probably pull out the pizzas in the same order you cook them but what do I know... never coming back to this location. I keep trying to add pictures but gmaps is being a POS.

text: Great crust. Super fast. The fire the pizza individually for you. Like a Chipotle for pizza, you can add toppings to customize. Good range of toppings.

name: Mariah Oatts
text: AMAZING! Pizza was delicious and ingredients taste fresh. Great ambiance in an easy to access place. One of my favorite places to eat

name: Jeff Comparone

Great Pizza!  Visited the Chicago location with our 4 year old.

name: Tony Davis
text: Customer service is an A+. Always welcoming and polite. Food is quick and made right every time. Great selection of toppings and sauces. Can get busy, but that's because they're that good.

name: P L
text: Lively warm Inviting staff . First time trying this place and it was great. I'll definitely come back. Thank you !

name: Paul Xanders
text: Wonderful, flavorful little pizzas. This location stands out because of the great staff, Sharnie especially. Come in a few times and they're likely to have your order memorized.
